text: Yesli vy, o neveruyushchiye, obrashchayetes' k Kaabe, prosya pobedu v srazhenii mezhdu vami i veruyushchimi, resheniye uzhe prishlo k vam: pobeda ne vam, pobeda - veruyushchim. Yesli zhe vy snova vernotes' k srazheniyu, My poshlom vam porazheniye, i vasha obshchina iz neveruyushchikh greshnikov vam ne pomozhet, dazhe yesli vy budete prevoskhodit' veruyushchikh svoyey chislennost'yu. Allakh na storone tekh, kotoryye uverovali v Istinu i smirenno poklonyayutsya Yemu
